SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CashRegister
This class represents a cash register in the store.
Controller
This is the application's only controller class.
CurrentSale
This class represents the current sale.
ExtAccountingSystem
This class represents the application's accounting system that contains sale information.
ExtInventorySystem
This is the application's inventory system which contains information about all items in the store.
Item
Represents an item in the store that can be purchased by a customer.
ItemDTO
Contains information about one particular item's price, identifier, description, and quantity.
Main
The Main class contains the main method and performs all startup by creating new instances of SystemCreator, Printer, Controller, and View classes, and executes a sample execution.
Payment
This class represents the payment process for a sale.
Printer
The Printer class handles printing of receipts.
Receipt
The receipt of a sale.
SystemCreator
Responsible for instantiating the systems required for basic and alternative flows.
View
This program has no view, this class is a placeholder for the entire view.
